content.raw:
When gzweb is loaded in a web browser, the web server terminal lists several errors for images that cannot be found. Example:

"GET /assets/drc_practice_blue_cylinder/thumbnails/0.png" Error (404): "Not found"

This leads to several missing images in the web client, as can be seen in the attached screenshot. Some of the images load fine though (note the top two rows).
content.html:
When gzweb is loaded in a web browser, the web server terminal lists several errors for images that cannot be found. Example:

"GET /assets/drc_practice_blue_cylinder/thumbnails/0.png" Error (404): "Not found"

This leads to several missing images in the web client, as can be seen in the attached screenshot. Some of the images load fine though (note the top two rows).
